definitions.definition: A castle in Iran and the most famous stronghold of the Nizari Ismailis , also known as the Assassins .
A region in the modern-day Qazvin province of Iran in which the castle is located; Rudbar-i Alamut (Rudbar of Alamut)
A period in the history of the Nizari Ismailism beginning from the capture of the castle in 1090 AD until its capitulation to the Mongols in 1256 AD.

main_definition: A castle in Iran and the most famous stronghold of the Nizari Ismailis , also known as the Assassins .

A period in the history of the Nizari Ismailism beginning from the capture of the castle in 1090 AD until its capitulation to the Mongols in 1256 AD.

definitions.definition: Alamut (a historical region of Iran ; modern Qazvin )

main_definition: Alamut (a historical region of Iran ; modern Qazvin )
